description: Gold standard Q&A pairs for evaluating Pediatric Research RAG system

test_cases.question: What is the 5-year survival rate for pediatric acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL)?
What are the common late effects of childhood cancer treatment?
What treatments are used for pediatric neuroblastoma?
What is the St. Jude approach to treating pediatric brain tumors?
What clinical trials are available for relapsed leukemia at St. Jude?
What are the eligibility criteria for pediatric cancer clinical trials?
How does immunotherapy work for pediatric cancers?
What genetic factors are associated with childhood leukemia?
What supportive care is provided to pediatric cancer patients?
What is CAR-T cell therapy and how is it used in pediatric cancer treatment?

evaluation_criteria.retrieval_precision: Did we retrieve chunks from relevant source types?
evaluation_criteria.citation_accuracy: Did we cite the actual source used in the answer?
evaluation_criteria.answer_relevance: Does the answer contain expected keywords?
evaluation_criteria.confidence_calibration: Does confidence score reflect actual answer quality?
